name: uni-smart
description: Uni-Smart Academic Management System - Microservices Architecture

scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta,yellow,green,blue" -n "GATEWAY,FRONTEND,TIMETABLE,RESULTS,EXAMSEATING" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:timetable" "npm run dev:results" "npm run dev:examseating"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:gateway && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:python
scripts.install:python: npm run setup:venv:timetable && npm run setup:venv:results && npm run setup:venv:examseating
scripts.setup:venv:timetable: cd service-timetable-python && (if not exist venv python -m venv venv) && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:venv:results: cd "result analysis" && (if not exist venv python -m venv venv) && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup:venv:examseating: cd service-examseating-python && (if not exist venv python -m venv venv) && call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && pip install -r requirements.txt
